rules.natural: In the event that the northern lords start a rebellion, then their rebellion is suppressed.
Should the northern lords start a rebellion, their rebellion succeeds.

Either the northern lords start a rebellion, or if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the High Septon grants authorization for the coronation then the coronation ceremony is performed, then it is not the case that a schism occurs in the church, then it is not the case that King John is excommunicated, then it is not the case that King John is excommunicated.
Whenever a royal decree is issued by King John regarding the northern lords, the royal army deploys troops to the north region.
Given that the royal army deploys troops to the north region, a siege is laid on the capital city.
Provided that the royal army wins a battle in the north region, a royal pardon is not granted to the northern lords.
If the council authorizes the military campaign, then either King John declares war on the east region, or a jousting tournament occurs in the capital city.
The Pope issuing a papal bull concerning King John implies it is not the case that King John is excommunicated.
An envoy being sent from Rome to the court entails that the Pope issues a papal bull concerning King John.

Either the council proposes a peace treaty, or if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the High Septon grants authorization for the coronation then the coronation ceremony is performed, then it is not the case that a schism occurs in the church, then it is not the case that King John is excommunicated, then a truce is signed between King John and the northern lords.

King John announcing a tournament implies that either a feast is held in the capital city, or if it is not the case that if the council proposes a peace treaty then the council ratifies a peace treaty, then the war continues in the north region.
A harsh winter occurring entails that the vassals play the game of thrones.
The vassals playing the game of thrones implies that, provided the condition of tribute being paid is satisfied, the east region is secured.
Either the High Septon grants authorization for the coronation, or a jousting tournament occurs in the capital city.
If it is not the case that if the northern lords start a rebellion then it is not the case that their rebellion succeeds, then a royal pardon is granted to the northern lords.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if the northern lords start a rebellion then it is not the case that their rebellion succeeds, a royal decree is issued by King John regarding the northern lords.
Should it be false that if a siege is laid on the capital city then the royal army wins a battle in the north region, then diplomatic negotiations with the Baratheon alliance do not take place.
In the event that it is not the case that if the High Septon grants authorization for the coronation then the coronation ceremony is performed, a schism occurs in the church.

If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if a siege is laid on the capital city then the royal army wins a battle in the north region, then diplomatic negotiations with the Baratheon alliance take place, then a foreign invasion occurs from Essos.

Provided it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the High Septon grants authorization for the coronation then the coronation ceremony is performed, then it is not the case that a schism occurs in the church, then King John is excommunicated.

In the event that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the High Septon grants authorization for the coronation then the coronation ceremony is performed, then it is not the case that a schism occurs in the church, an envoy is sent from Rome to the court.
Should the council not authorize the military campaign, the condition of tribute being paid is satisfied.
Provided the council does not authorize the military campaign, it is not the case that the east region is secured.
If King John does not announce a tournament, a plague outbreak occurs in the capital city.
Under the condition that King John does not announce a tournament, a plague outbreak does not occur in the capital city.
